title: Jocko Underground: The Political Climate-Are We Headed For Another Civil War in America? The Indirect Approach for the Win. The Fear of Blood?
itunes:author: Jocko DEFCOR Network
description:
The indirect approach wins. The direct approach loses.

Are we headed for another civil war in America?

Dealing with a poor superior.

Dealing with the fear of blood.

Jiu Jitsu: I may have a substandard academy and not know it.
